member.summary: The autocomplete is a normal text input enhanced by a panel of suggested options.

member.summary: Maximum number of elements displayed in the popup

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Components.MatAutocomplete.BaseMatAutocomplete`1.Label
member.summary: The label of the TextField

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Components.MatAutocomplete.BaseMatAutocomplete`1.Icon
member.summary: The Icon displayed as the leading icon for the TextField

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Components.MatAutocomplete.BaseMatAutocomplete`1.StringValue
member.summary: The StringValue displayed in the TextField

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Components.MatAutocomplete.BaseMatAutocomplete`1.Value
member.summary: The value to be used to pre-select an item from the list

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Components.MatAutocomplete.BaseMatAutocomplete`1.ValueChanged
member.summary: ValueChanged is fired when the value is selected(by clicking on an element in the popup)

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Components.MatAutocomplete.BaseMatAutocomplete`1.ItemTemplate
member.summary: ItemTemplate is used to render the elements in the popup if no template is given then the string value of the objects is displayed..

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Components.MatAutocomplete.BaseMatAutocomplete`1.CustomStringSelector
member.summary: This function is used to select the string part from the item, used both for filtering and displaying if no ItemTemplate is defined.

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Components.MatAutocomplete.BaseMatAutocomplete`1.Collection
member.summary: The collection which should be rendered and filtered

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Components.MatAutocomplete.BaseMatAutocomplete`1.Outlined
member.summary: If this parameter is true then the style of the textbox is outlined see `MatTextfield`

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Components.MatAutocomplete.BaseMatAutocomplete`1.OnOpenedChanged
member.summary: OnOpenedChanged is fired when the popup dialog is opened or close and the parameter indicates whenever is it open, the default value is false

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Components.MatAutocomplete.BaseMatAutocomplete`1.OnTextChanged
member.summary: OnTextChanged is fired when the string value is changed(when an input occurs in the textfield or when an item is selected)

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Components.MatAutocomplete.BaseMatAutocomplete`1.ShowClearButton
member.summary: This value indicates if the clear button(using a trailing icon) should be displayed, which can clear the entire text and the selected value), the default value is false

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Components.MatAutocomplete.BaseMatAutocomplete`1.FullWidth
member.summary: This value indicates if the textfield and the dialog will be or not displayed in the full screen, the default value is false
